text: Add sources jars to embedded distribution.  They also should be uploaded to Maven Central, but I don't see any existing build targets for that, so I assume it's a separate manual process.  At least if the source jars were available in the build it would be easy to publish them.

creator: david_syer@hotmail.com
text:
Created attachment 24247
Patch to build.xml adding target "embed-sources"

Added patch to build.xml adding target "embed-sources" (embed-sources-patch.txt).  Creates jar files *-src.jar in the output/embed directory by default.
Thanks for the patch. I tweaked it to align with a few changes I made since you wrote the patch and also to use jarIt to add the required LICENSE and NOTICE files
